title: Overall
stimulusHtml:
8-9:

  • Contains a clear, well-developed thesis that addresses impact on unity.

  • Understands the complexity of the question, including clear grasp or impact; addresses both unity and disunity in depth or one of these in significant depth.

  • Effectively analyzes the impact of territorial expansion.

  • Supports thesis with significant, relevant information spanning the time period (1800-1850)

  • May contain minor errors.

5-7:

  • Contains a clear thesis with limited development or insufficient focus on impact.

  • Limited understanding of complexity; some sense of impact on national unity; addresses unity and disunity in general way, or one of these in depth.

  • Limited analysis, mostly describes territorial expansion.

  • Supports thesis with some factual information from the time period (1800-1850).

  • May contain errors that do not detract from the overall argument.

2-4:

  • Lacks a thesis, or thesis is confused or undeveloped.

  • Ignores complexity; may merely mention impact; addresses both unity and disunity in a superficial way, or one of these in a general way.

  • Describes territorial expansion.

  • Information provided is minimal, or lacks supporting information.

  • May contain major errors.

0-1:

  • Incompetent response.

  • May simply paraphrase or restates the question.

  • Shows little or no understanding of either the question or the time period.
